title: (BlackBox) - Exploding Kittens - 1st edition
curation_notes:
STANDARD CARD GAME (GRAY) SLEEVES
Defuse x6, Exploding Kitten x4, Attack x4, Skip x4, Nope x5, Favor x4, Shuffle x4, See the Future x5, Kittens x4 of each (5 types).
Guests often erroneously shuffle the decks together, constant sorting is needed while the game remains popular.

title: (BlackBox) Exploding Kittens NSFW Deck
curation_notes:
STANDARD CARD GAME (GRAY) SLEEVES
56 cards: Defuse x6, Exploding Kitten x4, Attack x4, Skip x4, Nope x5, Favor x4, Shuffle x4, See the Future x5, Kittens x4 of each (5 types).
Guests often shuffle sets together, constant sorting needed.

title: Clue
curation_notes:
STANDARD AMERICAN BOARD GAME (GREEN) CARDS
1 board, 2 d6, 6 dry erase record sheets, 6 dry erase pens, 6 player pawns, 6 miniature weapons (completely useless for game play, but “part of the experience” and players are often adamant that they have them to play), 21 Clue cards (6 weapons, 6 suspects, 9 rooms), 1 solution envelope (non essential to game play)

title: Dominion
curation_notes:
STANDARD EUROPEAN BOARD GAME (PURPLE) SLEEVES
(Do not use Gray sleeves as they get caught and ripped too often when shuffled)

The “first game” set of cards have been marked with green stickers.

We remove the randomizer cards.

60 copper, 40 silver, 30 gold
24 estates, 12 duchies, 12 provinces, 12 gardens, 30 curses
10 cards each for each type of action card (village, smithy, cellar, etc)

title: Pandemic
curation_notes:
STANDARD CARD GAME (GRAY) SLEEVES
Infection deck is 48 cards (one for each city)
Player deck is 48 cards (one for each city), plus 5 event cards, and 6 epidemic cards.
Additional cards: 7 roles, 4 reference cards.
Cubes: 24 each of 4 colours
Assorted other pieces: 7 pawns, 6 research stations, 4 vaccine bottles, 1 outbreak tracker, 1 infection rate tracker, 1 board.
